DataElement.preferredName: Post Disease Progression Therapeutic Procedure Informed Consent Obtain Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date the patient consented to receive therapy after disease progression occurs.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Post Disease Progression Therapeutic Procedure Informed Consent Obtain
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._The worsening of a disease over time._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved._To come into possession of something.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Post Disease Progression Therapeutic Procedure Informed Consent
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:The worsening of a disease over time.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
A process that manifests as the worsening of a disease over time.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.

Property.preferredDefinition: To come into possession of something. (Concept includes term form "Obtained")

Concepts.definition: To come into possession of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Date of Treatment Beyond Prog
ReferenceDocuments.description: Date of Treatment Beyond Progress Informed Consent
